xwikidoc.author: XWiki.sdumitriu
xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #medsavant on 14 June 2013
xwikidoc.content: <mcupak> has joined #medsavant 07:30 <sdumitriu> Hey mcupak 07:30 <mcupak> hi sdumitriu 10:42 <sdumitriu1> has joined #medsavant 12:14 <bvancea> has joined #medsavant 12:14 <bvancea> hey sdumitriu 12:16 <sdumitriu1> Hey bvancea 12:17 <sdumitriu1> How's it going? 12:17 <bvancea> pretty good 12:18 <bvancea> I finished the parser and indexed some documents 12:18 <bvancea> I'm sort of annoyed about my internet 12:18 <bvancea> some switches stopped working in my dorm and I haven't had any internet since yesterday evening 12:19 <bvancea> I uploaded some credit on my phone to get a few hunders of MB of traffic for mobile 12:19 <bvancea> sucks :| 12:21 <bvancea> now I'm searching for small .vcf file 12:21 <bvancea> to index 12:21 <bvancea> I only had one file with around 200 000 variants available offline 12:22 <bvancea> so thats what I've indexed 12:22 <bvancea> has joined #medsavant 12:27 <bvancea> and how are you? 12:29 <sdumitriu1> Good 12:30 <sdumitriu1> Trying to migrate some services from a faulty server 12:30 <bvancea> xwiki related stuff? 12:30 <sdumitriu1> PhenoTips related 12:30 <bvancea> ah, I see 12:30 <sdumitriu1> How did the 200k file indexing go? 12:31 <bvancea> not without events 12:31 <bvancea> heap died the first time I tried it 12:31 <sdumitriu1> Hehe 12:31 <bvancea> the thing is, there are cases 12:32 <sdumitriu1> Was it the default? 12:32 <bvancea> yes 12:32 <sdumitriu1> 96M I think it's now 12:32 <sdumitriu1> That's too little for big app 12:32 <bvancea> I set it to over 2GB 12:32 <bvancea> I think 12:32 <sdumitriu1> Hm, maybe too much 12:32 <sdumitriu1> You should try with 256M 12:32 <sdumitriu1> If it requires more than that, something is wron 12:32 <sdumitriu1> g 12:32 <bvancea> yeah 12:33 <bvancea> the thing is, the largest file I had 12:33 <bvancea> had 1090ish dna id's per variant 12:33 <bvancea> which results in 1000+ documents per row 12:34 <sdumitriu1> Whoa 12:34 <bvancea> yeah 12:34 <bvancea> it'll probably be reduced if I filter out variants with HomoRef zygosity, like medsavant does 12:35 <bvancea> (no idea why tbh) 12:35 <bvancea> anyway, I need to refactor the code a bit aswell 12:35 <bvancea> sincer I used a scanner to parse the line contents 12:35 <bvancea> and the scanner internal buffer is set to 1024 characters 12:35 <bvancea> and I did some hack to make it work 12:36 <bvancea> kept reading 1024 char string and appending them together to a string builder 12:36 <bvancea> which is totally ugly and wrong but I just wanted to index something :)) 13:44 <bvancea> has joined #medsavant 16:34 <sdumitriu> has joined #medsavant
